Donald Rumsfeld authorized these specific techniques. The Late Show host David Letterman underwent emergency heart surgery in 2000 and chatted candidly with Barbara Walters about his feelings of joy following the operation. During the chat, David Letterman stated, Depression is a black hole... I've dabbled in it.`` There's a difference in being sad and being blue and being depressed and being chemically or clinically depressed. I do know the difference between those and it's horrifying.`` Without some kind of medicinal help... institutions used to be full of people who were depressed. by tea party activists and others- have pledged to reverse this dangerous trend of wasteful federal spending in an effort to place the nation on the path toward fiscal sanity. Veteran Indiana Congressman Mike Pence said: Any increase in the debt ceiling should be married to very real and significant reductions in spending in the short term and the long term.
